post.body: I'll take your word for it. Right after I learn what "lulz" means. :)
I'm clueless, so you're telling me getting linked to by them is GOOD?
Everest goes much faster than sitting here staring out the window and crying sweet, bitter tears. :)
I am trying to kill you. I'll be joining you tomorrow, though.
Getting linked to by a website called somethingawful.com is kind of dubious. But the internet is all about complaining, right?
Awesome! The wife okayed the Cintiq purchase, but I have to do it before the end of the year! I am giddy.
This is not right. It's snowing like mad here. I was in sunny and 80s weather. Why did I come home? Am I insane?
I was in a pool, sipping cocktails yesterday. Today, I just plowed 6 inches of snow out of my driveway. Bleck.
Love airlines. Post a delayed time. Then without warning or notice, move it back again. Don't announce or inform the passengers. Sigh.
At the airport. Ready to head home. Flight delayed already. Sigh.
http://twitpic.com/ueq1 -
http://twitpic.com/uekr -
http://twitpic.com/uean -
http://twitpic.com/ue92 -
http://twitpic.com/ue7x -
http://twitpic.com/ubm9 - Cuban shuffle.
http://twitpic.com/ub2b - Coconut rum Rasberry rum pineapple juice yum
Grrr. Spent half the afternoon checking on plans and it may be better to get out tomorrow. More weather Sunday.
Well, it looks like we're staying in Disney an extra day. I like the snow the northeast is getting. Sorry, Marvel guys.
This day at the pool will be balanced out by the day spent in the airport tomorrow.
